channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Data breach exposes millions of mSpy spyware customers

item.title: The 39 Best Shows on Max (aka HBO Max) Right Now (July 2024)
item.description: House of the Dragon, The Sopranos, and Fantasmas are just a few of the shows you need to be watching on Max this month.

item.title: Shark Tank-backed Kudos raises another $3M for healthier, cotton-based disposable diapers
item.description: Kudos founder says her company makes a disposable diaper lined with 100% cotton, unlike the major competitors. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved....

item.title: How Watermelon Cupcakes Kicked Off an Internal Storm at Meta

item.title: Notorious Hacker Kingpin ‘Tank’ Is Finally Going to Prison

item.title: ‘Visual’ AI models might not see anything at all

item.title: OpenAI Is Testing Its Powers of Persuasion
item.description: Sam Altman is touting AI’s ability to sway people's behavior. His company is also wrestling with the risks.
